title: (BUG REPORT) Twisted Fate/Scuttle crab bug

embed.description: For some reason Twisted Fate's stuns last 2x as long on the scuttle crab than they say they will in his Ability details. is this a bug?

body:
TL;DR: Twisted Fate's (yet untested with other champ's) stuns last twice as long on the scuttle crab

As you can see in the video, with just 1 point on my W (which means the stun should last for 1 sec) the crab is stunned for at least 2 sec and with full points on my W (which means the stun should last for 2 sec) the crab is clearly stunned for at very least 4 seconds. 
while this isn't game breaking, it does mean that in fights over the crab or fights just before dragon, you can keep the crab on your side of the river for 4 seconds, which is enough time for your team to burst it down before it speeds off over to the enemy.

replies.body: it does that with every stun at least, not sure about other CC. it's intended.
Read the TT of the crab.
